Hero.title: Step Into {brand} Style
Hero.subtitle: Discover top brands, premium comfort, and exclusive deals up to {discount}.

Footer.about: Modern shoe store offering the latest Nike, Adidas, Puma, and more. We aim to provide the best quality at the best price.

Testimonials.heading: What Our Customers Say
Testimonials.description: Real feedback from our customers who tried our products.
Testimonials.client1_text: The best store I have ever tried, excellent quality and fast delivery. I highly recommend everyone to buy without hesitation.
Testimonials.client2_text: Professional designs and top-notch customer service. It was a great experience and I will definitely repeat it.
Testimonials.client3_text: The price for the value is excellent. I received the product the same day with quality above expectations.
